intro: Lygistum spicatum, commonly known as the spikeflower lygistum, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. Its leaves are finely divided and resemble those of other members of the carrot family. Lygistum spicatum is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits.
